description:
Spacious lodging for up to 6 people. Apartment includes 2 bedrooms with 4 beds as well as a pull out Full size bed couch. Full access to kitchen and living room.

Huge space with a very home like feel

I provide basic courtesy items like water and milk in the fridge. A coffee making and coffee for all my guests. Free WiFi and cable TV. Anything further can be provided at request (shampoo, toothpaste in case of emergency)

My guest are always free to come and go as they please.

My location is relatively close to mass transit. Specifically the 3 and 4 train at Utica Avenue. As well as the A and C train at Ralph Avenue.
name: Home Away from Home
review: Ms. Quita's place was exactly as we expected. The rooms were clean and spacious, and the apartment was easy to find with available parking on the street. Ms. Quita was easy to communicate with and made our stay in the city comfortable and easy. Would absolutely suggest staying here again.
